name: Running Out Of Time (RPG Club Games)
name_original: Running Out Of Time (RPG Club Games)
description:
Running Out of Time is a Top Down 2D Cleaning Simulator where you have to clean the Plaza de España, situated in Madrid, which is covered in piles of garbage. Replant trees to make it a better place to visit once more using the Time Travel Device (TTD for short) wielded by Bob, the Time Traveler. 

Controls

WASD / Directional Arrows --> Movement 

E --> Interact with Objects

SPACE BAR --> Time Travel

Our team:

Programming: LunosDev & Adrián Espada

Art: Mikel Julián.

Design: Lucas Troyano
